todos.title: Learn React
todos.description: Start by reading the official React documentation and follow some tutorials.

todos.title: Build Todo App
todos.description: Create a simple todo application using React, where users can add, delete, and mark todos as completed.

menu.Title: Margherita Pizza
menu.Description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves. It's known for its simplicity and delicious flavor.

menu.Title: Grilled Salmon
menu.Description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, seasoned with herbs and spices. Served with a side of roasted vegetables and lemon wedges.

menu.Title: Chicken Tikka Masala
menu.Description: A popular Indian dish consisting of roasted chicken chunks (tikka) served in a rich, creamy, tomato-based sauce. It's typically seasoned with various spices and is often served with rice or naan bread.
